comment.author: 27392336@N05
comment._content: As a member of the "original" Gibbs family, I am proud to say I have one of these beautiful pieces of farming history in my home. No only is it what they used to refer to as a "plow of legend", but it makes one hell of a coffee table, albeit somewhat difficult to balance items on.

comment.author: 31033598@N03
comment._content: That's cool! I'm glad you like the image!
